description:
Plus - nice programme, lightweight.
minus - seems to crash for no obvious reason. So I stopped using it and prefer Libreoffice.
Unless you are going to stick with the AbiWord document format you will face many problems which are showstoppers really, Seems that we are stuck with LibreOffice Writer on GNOME for better or worse.
Doesn't work well with Fedora. Hangs, lags and then froze up my computer. Was completely disappointed. Will not use it again.
We've only had it loaded an hour and it's crashed multiple times. No thanks!

the main one: We save every minute a report (report 1, report2 and so on) Copy/paste text and pictures. After 10 times saving crash.- Each saved file crash too by opening! The whole job is trash. No success with save as or with changing names. There is only text and pictures - no special effect... Pity...
Lightweight, high performance, but fit for many tasks. Thumbs up!
This app is a lot quicker than LibreOffice Writer, but sometimes it can display heavily formatted documents awkwardly.
lots of crashes, copy-paste suddenly stopped working, invalid document just after saving it ... not recommended !

Sorry, this is a very useable programme but unfortunately is not compatible with docx cannot copy and paste body of text into an email and has all sort of bugs when used with a label printer (which works fine in windows and now Libre) . Shame as it is very lightwight and intuitive to use. 
I have had to uninstall and use Libre.
If you can iron out these issues I will be happy to reuse
not working for pdf

Cursor Broken, makes it impossible to type. Can you use the Debian 10 version as it is not broken. 3.0.2 is fine, 3.0.4 is broken on all OS's I've tried (Manjaro, Vanilla Arch, Ubuntu, Linux-Mint, Fedora) PLS Fix.

Lighter than other alternatives without sacrificing features. More features and improvements will come in time. Can't wait... This program is to good to be true. Also can't wait to boot this up in WSL2. Will be a compliment to other Windows programs. When all things are created equal among word processors, this one will shine among them. Cheers.
summary: Great application, lightweight and full of features

description: Use LibreOffice or Microsoft Office with Wine/Playonlinux. Abiword crashes all the time and you use all that you wrote with a crash, not trustworthy at all.
summary: This should have never been included with Lubuntu

description:
I would love to have written a positive review on this piece of software. It looked like a simple, no-nosense, distraction-free way of writing.

The problem? On a Kubuntu system, it is basically impossible to use for more than a few minutes. Becasue it just closes. No errors, no ability to save your work, no warning, nothing. It just closes/

I was hoping this was going to be a good central spot for me to jot down notes and screenshots...but I am unable to copy/paste from Abiwork to Thunderbird, making it useless to me.

I checked online and this bug has been around for over 10+ years. You've been warned. If your time is important to you, I'd look elsewhere.
This is my go to text app. "enyawix"
summary: This is my go to text app

description: While it does convert PDF to word, when it opens the PDF document the headings and text are all out of wack. I need something that is going to be exported exactly the way it looks and not rearrange all the text
Better than Libre

This program is underrated. It's probably the best text editor that I've used on linux- I started to use it a long time ago in windows when I completely switched to linux (that was long time ago) I remember to look for this soft as my favorite text editor for everyday work I don't find any compatibility issues. i can edit my files even on a Mac.
I would recommend it.

Kubuntu 22.04. Using Abiword 3.0.5. It is buggy. I opened one of my ODT files, I edited and closed it and opened it. Some of the images are gone. The font has changed from Arial to Times New Roman. instead of saving in Web mode it saves in Normal mode. When I opened the file with LibreOffice, I see the same problems present except that each page has a light gray rectangle encircling it. Also, the GUI looks odd under Kubuntu. I’m guessing it is coded with GTK.
On the other hand, it opens quicker than LibreOffice. It doesn’t have that render bug that LibreOffice has with very long documents.

Unexpectedly closes causing loss of all work done unless manually saving document at very regular intervals! Also pastes wrong data from copyboard and it's apparently impossible to have a multipage document with seoerate columns independent of each other, i.e what is typed in one column stays in that column and doesn't continue in the next when reaching bottom of the page...
I like interface and work well. But downfall is the importing file with pictures. I try docx, opd and no luck. No way to import an other word processor. Like other comments you are stuck to it.
It meets most home/office writing requirements (without needing a super computer or college degree to use). Professionals requiring more bells and whistles may want to look elsewhere, however.
summary: Simple, sufficient, slim requirements. Highly under-rated

description: its just time wasting

i have used for long time ago with every linux OS i have installed and got the same satisfaction pdf, html, word whatever i need , i got it. unbeilvieable being so small app snd got too much. try it, believe me if you dont have space in your disck, try this... ok.
Decent. PLS FIX THE CURSOR THO it dissappears and drives me crazy while typing a document. Nothing will fix it.
Love it, works like a charm, very easy to use and much better than other programs.
I installed on Ubintu 20.04 from Ubuntu repository. Version 3.0.4 . Crashing when I select the text and copy or cut it to the clipboard. Without the clipboard support it is useless.
summary: Crashing on Gnome when text is copied to clipboard

description: I can open and edit my WordPerfect files with this program. Do not need to install Wine. Only problem I have found so far is it will not print the barcode on envelopes. Love it.
Simple and gets the job done
summary: Gets work done in linux ecosystems

description: I wish i could use insert/overtype function with my chromebook. I need it for large amount of texts.
la empece a probar debería venir por defecto en Gnome en cualquier distro que se instale en vez de libreoffice
No inicia en Korora 25 Gnome con Waylnd
Desde hace más de 15 años uso Abiword como el procesador de textos libre sin parangón. ¡Muchas Gracias equipo de Gnome por esta herramienta tan valiosa!
Aplicación muy ligera e intuitiva.
quise imprimir con el editor un archivo de word y hubo mucha incompatibilidad de las paginas. me cambiaron mucho las imagenes y me agregaba mas paginas siendo en que cada una habia dos imagenes.
muy buena aplicacion
summary: muy util es simple y ligera

description: Va bien para tareas sencillas. Para usuarios avanzados mejor Libreoffice
summary: Ligera y rápida para los que no se complican la vida

description: Stops working after one minute
Intuitiva, ligera pero muy potente. Contiene varias herramientas para aprovecharla más.
Es buenisimo, excelente programa para tareas sencillas y muy rapido, lo recomiendo.
Very useful if you want to convert a pdf to docx or similar. Just import the pdf and save as whatever. Converson seems very accurate. I imported/exported documents in Czech without problems.

Si vous en avez ras le bol de la lourdeur d'un openoffice surtout si vous avez besoin d'utiliser seulement le traitement de texte, Abiword est la solution : simple, léger, permettant le travail collaboratif, supportant tous les formats etc...
Dans la description il y a une erreur car Abiword est un logiciel libre sous GNU GPL v2.0.
summary: Un bon traitement de texte libre sous GNU GPL v2.0 !

description: Application très légère, qui fonctionne avec n'importe quel ordinateur, même le plus faible. De plus, on peut convertir tous nos documents vers des formats word et pdf. Je recommande vraiment.
summary: Application très légère, qui fonctionne avec n'importe quel ordinateur

description: Souvent les fichier créés par Abiword se trouve impossible à réouvrir pour cause de type de fichier inconnu. Sinon tout est bon. Malheureusement ce bug est très sérieux car on perd le travail que l'on fait. Domâge.
summary: J'apprécie le dépouillement de l'écran mais plein de bug critiques

description:
Ouvre les fichiers .doc correctement contrairement à libre office.
De plus les menus s'affiche normalement dans le pinephone contrairement à libreoffice..

Infoutu d'interpréter correctement la mise en page d'un document contenant des paragraphes et des images dans un document crée pourtant sur Libreoffice Writer au format OpenDocument. Dur, pour un logiciel libre qui met ces formats en avant ! (çà n'est qu'un document de 4pages avec une bannière et 2 styles)

Crash dès le chargement d'un document complexe de plus de 4 pages.
summary: Perte de temps et de place dans les dépôts

description: Une fois télécharger, le logiciel s'installe par défaut pour les fichiers textes. Mais lorsque l'on veut supprimer le fichier c'est impossible. Obligé de réinstaller ma version d'UBUNTU
При работе с doc и docx часто смешается форматирование страниц. Пришлось удалить.
Amazing & Works
